channel.title: Cannot Get Compile.bat or Run.bat to work
channel.description:
Here's my compile.bat. [code]@echo off title Compile Color 3 echo Compiling cd src cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_45\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Correctly compiled pause[/code]
Here's the compile.bat error: [img]http://i.imgur.com/7O0AF9B.png[/img]
Here's my run.bat: [code]@echo off title Server cd src cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_45\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -classpath bin;deps/* com.rs2hd.Main pause[/code]
Here's the run.bat error: [img]http://i.imgur.com/yQUrPoR.png[/img]
CLASSPATH: [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin;[/code]
PATH: [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_45\bin;[/code]
Thanks for the help!

item.title: Cannot Get Compile.bat or Run.bat to work
item.dc:creator: @divinationofgods divinationofgods
item.description:
@divinationofgods wrote:

Update to JDK JRE 1.8.0_25, and then change compile and run path to that, before you do go ahead to your C drive and click “program files” and make sure that “Java” is located there, if not it could be in Program files 86, in which you’d change your path to

Program files (x86)

Read full topic
item.source: Cannot Get Compile.bat or Run.bat to work

item.title: Cannot Get Compile.bat or Run.bat to work
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

Change the JAVA Path in your compiler and run.
Consider using IDE NetBeans or Eclipse, then you wouldn’t be having these problems.
If first option doesn’t work, then Update your JDK to at least JDK 7…
6_45 is a lil too old bud and some servers don’t accept it.

Read full topic
item.source: Cannot Get Compile.bat or Run.bat to work

item.title: Cannot Get Compile.bat or Run.bat to work
item.dc:creator: @Jackyi Jackyi
item.description:
@Jackyi wrote:

Here’s my compile.bat.

@echo off title Compile Color 3 echo Compiling cd src cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_45\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Correctly compiled pause

Here’s the compile.bat error:

Here’s my run.bat:

@echo off title Server cd src cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_45\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -classpath bin;deps/* com.rs2hd.Main pause

Here’s the run.bat error:

CLASSPATH:

PATH:

Thanks for the help!
